title: Kudos to Kris Sowersby
content:
Our own frequenter of Typohile and brilliant young type designer from [New Zealand](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/New%252BZealand), [Kris Sowersby](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kris%252BSowersby), [KLIM](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/KLIM) (is milk spelled backwards:-)) is the newest member of [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Village) and his [Feijoa](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Feijoa) type is soon to be released.  
I have seen and admired his work here in the critique area and now it is finally out on the market! BRAVO! BRAVO! BRAVO!!!

Great work Kris and the best of luck to you!

ChrisL

 [‹ Proud Papa braggin' on his daughter](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/node/19773 "Go to previous forum topic") [Congratulations are in order... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/typophile.com/node/19493 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Congrats, Kris. Hope we’ll see [Sevilo](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808134111/http:/klim.co.nz/content/type/sevilo_01.html) in the vllg soon.
I wish the Karv family was at VLLG too. And according to the designer- Eliza, another wonderful face- will most likely not be coming to the market... I hope he changes his mind.

Congrats - welcome to the the only village I’ve ever heard of that doesn’t have a single idiot.

Si

Well done Kris. I am glad to see we can now start to get hold of some of these great faces which we have only been able to admire on your site(s) up until now. As a fellow kiwi and someone who studied with Kris not so long ago it is fantastic to see a new NZ type designer (and one I have had the pleasure of knowing) breaking into the international market. Keep going mate, I look forward to owning some of your faces in the not too distant future.

-nic

Really nice work. Me like it :-)  
Well deserved!! Congrats and best of luck.
Congrats, it’s great to see a NZ designer up there with the rest. I look forward to using some of your faces in future jobs. :^)

Well then, isn’t this a surprise! Thanks a lot for all your support. Hopefully I’ll actually finish a few before the year is out…

—K
Sei molto bravo, Kris, haere ra.

“Hopefully I’ll actually finish a few before the year is out…”

We all hope so too Kris! (I can say the same for me:-))

ChrisL
very, exciting chris. the world of type needs your fresh designs. i hope your partnership with village is a long and prospersous one!
excellent news and well-deserved. congrats, kris.

I don’t heap very high praise lightly, and I don’t want to embarrass Kris, but over the past few months I’ve come to realize that he’s probably the most promising type designer on the planet.

hhp
Yes all is well, hopefully more of us New Zealanders can follow in your footsteps.
Adding to the pile, Kris, your type is superb. Best of luck!
